SELECT iprofessor,B.major_name majorName ,nm,gender,birthdate,phone,email ,address,A.del_yn delYn,date(A.created_at) createdAt FROM professor A INNER JOIN major B ON A.imajor=B.imajor
and A.nm in (#{name})
and B.imajor =#{imajor}
ORDER BY A.imajor LIMIT #{staIdx},10

SELECT A.lecture_str_date lectureStrDate, A.lecture_end_date lectureEndDate , A.lecture_str_time lectureStrTime, A.lecture_end_time lectureEndTime, B.lecture_name lectureName , C.nm name, C.gender gender, C.birthdate birthDate, C.phone phone , C.address address, C.email email , D.major_name majorName, C.created_at createdAt,C.del_yn delYn FROM lecture_applly A INNER JOIN lecture_name B ON A.ilecture_name = B.ilecture_name INNER JOIN professor C ON A.iprofessor = C.iprofessor INNER JOIN major D ON C.imajor = D.imajor WHERE C.iprofessor = #{iprofessor} AND A.isemester = (SELECT MaX(isemester) from semester )

SELECT A.nm name, A.gender gender,A.pic, A.birthdate birthDate , A.phone phone, A.address address, A.email email , B.imajor, A.created_at createdAt,A.del_yn delYn from professor A INNER JOIN major B ON A.imajor = B.imajor WHERE A.iprofessor = #{iprofessor}

SELECT A.ilecture,A.lecture_str_date lectureStrDate, A.lecture_end_date lectureEndDate , date_format(A.lecture_str_time,'%H:%i') lectureStrTime, date_format(A.lecture_end_time,'%H:%i') lectureEndTime, B.lecture_name lectureName from lecture_applly A INNER JOIN lecture_name B ON A.ilecture_name = B.ilecture_name WHERE A.iprofessor = #{iprofessor}
